name: Nick Sports
description:
Welcome to Nick Sports, a slime-covered athletic extravaganza! Test your skills and flick your way to Basketball, Soccer and Baseball glory! Climb the rankings from Rookie to World Champ in this ultimate sports challenge.

Features:
o Play Soccer, Basketball and Baseball in the Nick Sportsplex!
o Amazing arenas that react to your progress and up the challenge during gameplay!
o Top the leader boards and go from Rookie to World Champion!
o Collect tons of sports fanatic ball designs and badges!
o Hilarious commentary from Nick Sportsplex hosts Chet and Max
